patthana14.31:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana14.31:0.3_0: And he deceives to live with formal support.
patthana14.31:1.1_0: Does not give rise to rapture.
patthana14.31:10.1_0: equanimity doesnâ€™t give rise to diversity of elements.
patthana14.31:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for rapture.
patthana14.31:4.1_0: Principle arises dependent on the rapture and bliss born of rapture.
patthana14.31:5.1_0: (Contact is a condition for the full ordination.)
patthana14.31:7.1_0: Pleasant is a condition for bliss. ...
patthana14.31:8.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the happiness of the teaching.
